column2: Florida Bans Transgender Athletes in 11th Hour Move
column5: Near the end of the legislative session the Republicans in the Florida Legislature snuck a ban on transgender female athletes into a bill dealing with charter schools. While the Democrats cried foul the measure passed and is headed to to Gov. DeSantis who has already voiced support. story The action will undoubtedly touch of retributions from business and other groups including the NCAA which will refuse to hold post-season events in the state.
